'use client';

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import questions from '../questions.json';

type OptionKeys = 'A' | 'B' | 'C';

interface Question {
  question: string;
  options: Record<OptionKeys, string>;
}

interface RefillOptions {
  up_to_3_weeks: string;
  up_to_4_weeks: string;
  up_to_5_weeks: string;
}

interface RemovalOptions {
  option_1: string;
  option_2: string;
}

interface Result {
  recommendation: string;
  refill_options: RefillOptions;
  removal_options?: RemovalOptions;
}

interface Results {
  mostly_A: Result;
  mostly_B: Result;
  mostly_C: Result;
}

interface QuestionsData {
  title: string;
  questions: Question[];
  results: Results;
}

const Quiz: React.FC = () => {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);
  const [answers, setAnswers] = useState<Record<number, OptionKeys | null>>({});
  const [result, setResult] = useState<Result | null>(null);

  const handleChange = (questionIndex: number, option: OptionKeys) => {
    setAnswers((prev) => ({ ...prev, [questionIndex]: option }));
    setResult(null); // Reset result when answers change
  };

  const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    const count: Record<OptionKeys, number> = { A: 0, B: 0, C: 0 };

    Object.values(answers).forEach((answer) => {
      if (answer) {
        count[answer]++;
      }
    });

    const maxAnswer = Object.keys(count).reduce((a, b) => (count[a as OptionKeys] > count[b as OptionKeys] ? a : b)) as OptionKeys;
    const results = (questions as QuestionsData).results;
    setResult(results[`mostly_${maxAnswer}`]);
  };

  return (
    <div className="w-full max-w-2xl mx-auto my-8">
      <button
        onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
        className="w-full bg-pink-500 hover:bg-pink-600 text-white font-bold py-4 px-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 flex justify-between items-center"
      >
        <span>Find Your Perfect Lash Treatment!</span>
        <span className="transform transition-transform duration-300" style={{ transform: isOpen ? 'rotate(180deg)' : 'none' }}>
          ▼
        </span>
      </button>
      
      {isOpen && (
        <div className="mt-4 p-6 bg-white dark:bg-rose-800 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
          <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-6 text-center">{(questions as QuestionsData).title}</h2>
          <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
            {(questions as QuestionsData).questions.map((question: Question, index: number) => (
              <div key={index} className="mb-6">
                <p className="font-semibold mb-3">{question.question}</p>
                <div className="space-y-2">
                  {Object.entries(question.options).map(([key, value]) => (
                    <label key={key} className="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 hover:bg-pink-50 dark:hover:bg-rose-700 rounded-lg cursor-pointer transition-colors duration-200">
                      <input
                        type="radio"
                        name={`question-${index}`}
                        value={key}
                        onChange={() => handleChange(index, key as OptionKeys)}
                        checked={answers[index] === key}
                        className="form-radio text-pink-500"
                      />
                      <span>{value}</span>
                    </label>
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
            <button 
              type="submit" 
              className="w-full bg-pink-500 hover:bg-pink-600 text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg transition-all duration-300"
            >
              Get Your Recommendation
            </button>
          </form>
          
          {result && (
            <div className="mt-8 p-6 bg-pink-50 dark:bg-rose-700 rounded-lg">
              <h3 className="text-xl font-bold mb-4">Your Recommendation</h3>
              <p className="mb-4">{result.recommendation}</p>
              
              <h4 className="font-semibold mb-2">Refill Options:</h4>
              <ul className="list-disc pl-5 mb-4">
                <li>Up to 3 weeks: {result.refill_options.up_to_3_weeks}</li>
                <li>Up to 4 weeks: {result.refill_options.up_to_4_weeks}</li>
                <li>Up to 5 weeks: {result.refill_options.up_to_5_weeks}</li>
              </ul>

              {result.removal_options && (
                <>
                  <h4 className="font-semibold mb-2">Removal Options:</h4>
                  <ul className="list-disc pl-5">
                    <li>{result.removal_options.option_1}</li>
                    <li>{result.removal_options.option_2}</li>
                  </ul>
                </>
              )}
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default Quiz;

'use client';

import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { FaArrowUp } from 'react-icons/fa';

const ScrollToTopButton = () => {
  const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false);

  const toggleVisibility = () => {
    if (window.pageYOffset > 300) {
      setIsVisible(true);
    } else {
      setIsVisible(false);
    }
  };

  const scrollToTop = () => {
    window.scrollTo({
      top: 0,
      behavior: 'smooth',
    });
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    window.addEventListener('scroll', toggleVisibility);
    return () => {
      window.removeEventListener('scroll', toggleVisibility);
    };
  }, []);

  return (
    <button
      onClick={scrollToTop}
      aria-label="Scroll to top of page"
      className={`
        fixed bottom-8 left-8 
        bg-black
        text-white 
        p-3 rounded-full 
        shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl
        transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out
        focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black focus:ring-offset-2
        transform hover:-translate-y-1
        z-50
        ${isVisible ? 'opacity-100 translate-y-0' : 'opacity-0 translate-y-4 pointer-events-none'}
      `}
    >
      <FaArrowUp className="w-5 h-5" />
    </button>
  );
};

export default ScrollToTopButton;

.switch {
  all: unset;
  position: absolute;
  right: 20px;
  top: 70px;
  display: inline-block;
  color: currentColor;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 1px dashed currentColor;
  cursor: pointer;
  --size: 24px;
  height: var(--size);
  width: var(--size);
  transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out 0s !important;
}

[data-mode="system"] .switch::after {
  position: absolute;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: calc(var(--size) / 2);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  content: "A";
}

[data-mode="light"] .switch {
  box-shadow: 0 0 50px 10px yellow;
  background-color: yellow;
  border: 1px solid orangered;
}

[data-mode="dark"] .switch {
  box-shadow: calc(var(--size) / 4) calc(var(--size) / -4) calc(var(--size) / 8)

"use client";

import styles from "./switch.module.css";
import { memo, useEffect, useState } from "react";

declare global {
  var updateDOM: () => void;
}

type ColorSchemePreference = "system" | "dark" | "light";

const STORAGE_KEY = "nextjs-blog-starter-theme";
const modes: ColorSchemePreference[] = ["system", "dark", "light"];

/** to reuse updateDOM function defined inside injected script */

/** function to be injected in script tag for avoiding FOUC (Flash of Unstyled Content) */
export const NoFOUCScript = (storageKey: string) => {
  /* can not use outside constants or function as this script will be injected in a different context */
  const [SYSTEM, DARK, LIGHT] = ["system", "dark", "light"];

  /** Modify transition globally to avoid patched transitions */
  const modifyTransition = () => {
    const css = document.createElement("style");
    css.textContent = "*,*:after,*:before{transition:none !important;}";
    document.head.appendChild(css);

    return () => {
      /* Force restyle */
      getComputedStyle(document.body);
      /* Wait for next tick before removing */
      setTimeout(() => document.head.removeChild(css), 1);
    };
  };

  const media = matchMedia(`(prefers-color-scheme: ${DARK})`);

  /** function to add remove dark class */
  window.updateDOM = () => {
    const restoreTransitions = modifyTransition();
    const mode = localStorage.getItem(storageKey) ?? SYSTEM;
    const systemMode = media.matches ? DARK : LIGHT;
    const resolvedMode = mode === SYSTEM ? systemMode : mode;
    const classList = document.documentElement.classList;
    if (resolvedMode === DARK) classList.add(DARK);
    else classList.remove(DARK);
    document.documentElement.setAttribute("data-mode", mode);
    restoreTransitions();
  };
  window.updateDOM();
  media.addEventListener("change", window.updateDOM);
};

let updateDOM: () => void;

/**
 * Switch button to quickly toggle user preference.
 */
const Switch = () => {
  const [mode, setMode] = useState<ColorSchemePreference>(
    () =>
      ((typeof localStorage !== "undefined" &&
        localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY)) ??
        "system") as ColorSchemePreference,
  );

  useEffect(() => {
    // store global functions to local variables to avoid any interference
    updateDOM = window.updateDOM;
    /** Sync the tabs */
    addEventListener("storage", (e: StorageEvent): void => {
      e.key === STORAGE_KEY && setMode(e.newValue as ColorSchemePreference);
    });
  }, []);

  useEffect(() => {
    localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, mode);
    updateDOM();
  }, [mode]);

  /** toggle mode */
  const handleModeSwitch = () => {
    const index = modes.indexOf(mode);
    setMode(modes[(index + 1) % modes.length]);
  };
  return (
    <button
      suppressHydrationWarning
      className={styles.switch}
      onClick={handleModeSwitch}
    />
  );
};

const Script = memo(() => (
  <script
    dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{
      __html: `(${NoFOUCScript.toString()})('${STORAGE_KEY}')`,
    }}
  />
));

/**
 * This component wich applies classes and transitions.
 */
export const ThemeSwitcher = () => {
  return (
    <>
      <Script />
      <Switch />
    </>
  );
};

import { Metadata } from "next";
import { notFound } from "next/navigation";
import { getAllPosts, getPostBySlug } from "@/lib/api";
import { CMS_NAME } from "@/lib/constants";
import markdownToHtml from "@/lib/markdownToHtml";
import Container from "@/app/_components/container";
import Header from "@/app/_components/header";
import { PostBody } from "@/app/_components/post-body";
import { PostHeader } from "@/app/_components/post-header";

type Params = {
  params: Promise<{
    slug: string;
  }>;
};

export async function generateMetadata(props: Params): Promise<Metadata> {
  const params = await props.params;
  const post = getPostBySlug(params.slug);

  if (!post) {
    return notFound();
  }

  const title = `${post.title} | Next.js Blog Example with ${CMS_NAME}`;

  return {
    title,
    openGraph: {
      title,
      images: [post.ogImage.url],
    },
  };
}

export async function generateStaticParams() {
  const posts = getAllPosts();

  return posts.map((post) => ({
    slug: post.slug,
  }));
}

export default async function Post(props: Params) {
  const params = await props.params;
  const post = getPostBySlug(params.slug);

  if (!post) {
    return notFound();
  }

  const content = await markdownToHtml(post.content || "");

  return (
    <main>
      <Container>
        <Header />
        <article className="mb-32">
          <PostHeader
            title={post.title}
            coverImage={post.coverImage}
            date={post.date}
            author={post.author}
          />
          <PostBody content={content} />
        </article>
      </Container>
    </main>
  );
}

import Container from "@/app/_components/container";
import { HeroPost } from "@/app/_components/hero-post";
import { Intro } from "@/app/_components/intro";
import { MoreStories } from "@/app/_components/more-stories";
import { getAllPosts } from "@/lib/api";

export default function Index() {
  const allPosts = getAllPosts();

  const heroPost = allPosts[0];

  const morePosts = allPosts.slice(1);

  return (
    <main>
      <Container>
        <Intro />
        <HeroPost
          title={heroPost.title}
          coverImage={heroPost.coverImage}
          date={heroPost.date}
          author={heroPost.author}
          slug={heroPost.slug}
          excerpt={heroPost.excerpt}
        />
        {morePosts.length > 0 && <MoreStories posts={morePosts} />}
      </Container>
    </main>
  );
}

import { Post } from "@/interfaces/post";
import fs from "fs";
import matter from "gray-matter";
import { join } from "path";

const postsDirectory = join(process.cwd(), "_posts");

export function getPostSlugs() {
  return fs.readdirSync(postsDirectory);
}

export function getPostBySlug(slug: string) {
  const realSlug = slug.replace(/\.md$/, "");
  const fullPath = join(postsDirectory, `${realSlug}.md`);
  const fileContents = fs.readFileSync(fullPath, "utf8");
  const { data, content } = matter(fileContents);

  return { ...data, slug: realSlug, content } as Post;
}

export function getAllPosts(): Post[] {
  const slugs = getPostSlugs();
  const posts = slugs
    .map((slug) => getPostBySlug(slug))
    // sort posts by date in descending order
    .sort((post1, post2) => (post1.date > post2.date ? -1 : 1));
  return posts;
}

import { remark } from "remark";
import html from "remark-html";

export default async function markdownToHtml(markdown: string) {
  const result = await remark().use(html).process(markdown);
  return result.toString();
}

#Issue Title: Implement a Feedback Slider

## Benefit Hypothesis:
- With a visually appealing and interactive feedback slider, users will engage more with customer testimonials, increasing trust and conversion rates for HA Beauty’s services.

## Objective:
- Create an engaging, mobile-friendly, and seamless testimonial display that enhances credibility and customer trust, ensuring potential customers feel confident in choosing HA Beauty.

## Story Context:
HA Beauty has built a strong reputation for providing high-quality beauty services, particularly in lash styling. However, potential users visiting the website often hesitate before booking an appointment due to a lack of social proof. By integrating a **FeedbackSlider**, we can prominently showcase authentic customer testimonials in a **visually engaging** and **interactive** way. This allows visitors to **quickly grasp the quality and impact** of HA Beauty’s services, ultimately encouraging them to take action—whether it’s booking an appointment or following HA Beauty on social media.

## Technical Requirements:

### Framework & Libraries:
- Built with Next.js 15 and TypeScript.
- Uses Swiper.js for interactive slider functionality.
- Generate Typesafe code.

## Implementation Steps:

### 1. In `swiper.tsx`:
- Generate a Next.js client component in TypeScript named `FeedbackSlider.tsx` and export it.
- **Important:** The file must start with `"use client";` to ensure compatibility with Next.js 15.
- The component should display customer feedback in a slider using the Swiper.js library.
- Use the following exact imports (no variations):
    ```typescript
    import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react';
    import { Pagination } from 'swiper/modules';
    import 'swiper/css';
    import 'swiper/css/pagination';
    ```
- The Swiper should:
    - Be wrapped in a `<div>` that controls the maximum width so Swiper doesn’t stretch too wide on large screens, centers the slider while allowing it to scale dynamically on different devices, provides proper padding and margin to avoid layout shifts, and prevents horizontal scrolling issues by ensuring the content stays within the viewport.
    - Enable infinite looping so the slides rotate continuously.
    - Include pagination with clickable dots for navigation.
    - Have spacing between slides to create a clear separation between them.
    - Use pagination as a module to ensure proper functionality.
    - Be centered on the page to maintain a balanced layout.
- The component should:
    - Use a modern and responsive design that adapts to different screen sizes.
    - Display a title at the top that is large, bold, and centered.
    - Render each feedback item inside a slide with:
        - A white background to ensure readability.
        - Rounded corners for a smooth, elegant appearance.
        - Padding around the content to prevent text from touching the edges.
        - A subtle shadow effect to give a card-like appearance.
- Define a TypeScript interface called `Feedback` with the following properties: `name`, `age`, `profession`, `feedback`.
- Store the feedback data in an array named `feedbackData`, formatted as follows:

    #### Feedback Data (Expressed in Natural Language):
    - **Sophie Lehmann**, a 24-year-old Fashion Blogger, raves about HA Beauty:
        > "HA Beauty is my go-to for the perfect lashes that make my photos pop! The artists are super creative and always stay ahead of the latest trends. My followers love the results!"

    - **Lena Bauer**, a 30-year-old Graphic Designer, appreciates the elegance and lasting quality of HA Beauty’s lash styles:
        > "I adore the elegant lash styles at HA Beauty. They enhance my eyes beautifully and last for weeks. The studio has a serene atmosphere, making each visit a relaxing experience."

    - **Mia Schneider**, a 19-year-old University Student, values affordability and quality:
        > "As a student, I love how HA Beauty offers stunning lashes without breaking the bank. Whether it's for classes or nights out with friends, my lashes always look amazing!"

    - **Emily Fischer**, a 27-year-old Makeup Artist, finds HA Beauty perfect for her professional needs:
        > "HA Beauty is fantastic! The lashes are perfect for my makeup looks, adding that extra flair without looking fake. The team is professional and always attentive to my specific needs."

    - **Julia Wagner**, a 33-year-old Social Media Influencer, depends on HA Beauty’s long-lasting lashes for her busy schedule:
        > "HA Beauty delivers flawless, long-lasting lashes that hold up through my busiest schedules. Whether it's for a photoshoot or live streaming, my lashes always look perfect thanks to HA Beauty!"

- **Design:**
    - Each `SwiperSlide` should:
        - Include a Header.
        - Display the feedback text in an eye-catching way, making it slightly larger and italicized to highlight the testimonial.
        - Include a section below the text that presents the person's name, age, and profession in a structured format.
            - The name should be bold and prominent, while the age and profession should be smaller and subtly styled to provide context without overwhelming the design.
        - Ensure the layout is fully responsive:
            - On smaller screens, the feedback text and details should be stacked vertically for a clear and readable format.
            - On larger screens, the layout should use a horizontal arrangement to create a visually balanced design.
    - The final component must be fully functional, require no additional modifications, and be ready for use in a Next.js project.

### 2. In `layout.tsx`:
- Import the `FeedbackSlider` from `swiper.tsx` correctly.
- Position the `FeedbackSlider` above the Quiz Component and its wrapper.

## Acceptance Criteria:

### General Requirements:
- The `FeedbackSlider` must be written in TypeScript and saved in `swiper.tsx`.
- The `swiper.tsx` file must start with `"use client";` to ensure compatibility with Next.js App Router.
- `FeedbackSlider` must use Swiper.js to implement a customer feedback slider.
- `FeedbackSlider` must be fully functional and production-ready without requiring modifications.
- `swiper.tsx` must import Swiper.js correctly.
- `FeedbackSlider` needs to be imported correctly in `layout.tsx`.
- The `FeedbackSlider` needs to follow the design instructions and technical requirements.
- Important:The feedback data must be stored in an array named `feedbackData`, and use the TypeScript interface named `Feedback`.

"use client";

import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react';
import { Pagination } from 'swiper/modules';
import 'swiper/css';
import 'swiper/css/pagination';

interface Feedback {
  name: string;
  age: number;
  profession: string;
  feedback: string;
}

const feedbackData: Feedback[] = [
  {
    name: "Sophie Lehmann",
    age: 24,
    profession: "Fashion Blogger",
    feedback: "HA Beauty is my go-to for the perfect lashes that make my photos pop! The artists are super creative and always stay ahead of the latest trends. My followers love the results!"
  },
  {
    name: "Lena Bauer",
    age: 30,
    profession: "Graphic Designer",
    feedback: "I adore the elegant lash styles at HA Beauty. They enhance my eyes beautifully and last for weeks. The studio has a serene atmosphere, making each visit a relaxing experience."
  },
  {
    name: "Mia Schneider",
    age: 19,
    profession: "University Student",
    feedback: "As a student, I love how HA Beauty offers stunning lashes without breaking the bank. Whether it's for classes or nights out with friends, my lashes always look amazing!"
  },
  {
    name: "Emily Fischer",
    age: 27,
    profession: "Makeup Artist",
    feedback: "HA Beauty is fantastic! The lashes are perfect for my makeup looks, adding that extra flair without looking fake. The team is professional and always attentive to my specific needs."
  },
  {
    name: "Julia Wagner",
    age: 33,
    profession: "Social Media Influencer",
    feedback: "HA Beauty delivers flawless, long-lasting lashes that hold up through my busiest schedules. Whether it's for a photoshoot or live streaming, my lashes always look perfect thanks to HA Beauty!"
  }
];

const FeedbackSlider: React.FC = () => {
  return (
    <div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto p-4">
      <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-center mb-6">What Our Clients Say</h2>
      <Swiper
        pagination={{ clickable: true }}
        loop={true}
        spaceBetween={30}
        modules={[Pagination]}
        className="mySwiper"
      >
        {feedbackData.map((feedback, index) => (
          <SwiperSlide key={index}>
            <div className="bg-white rounded-lg p-6 shadow-md">
              <h3 className="text-xl italic mb-4">"{feedback.feedback}"</h3>
              <p className="font-bold">{feedback.name}, {feedback.age} - {feedback.profession}</p>
            </div>
          </SwiperSlide>
        ))}
      </Swiper>
    </div>
  );
};

export default FeedbackSlider;

Refill and removal services also available." coverImage: "/assets/blog/dynamic-routing/cover.jpg" date: "2020-03-16T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/dynamic-routing/cover.jpg" --- Understanding the pricing of lash extensions is essential for making an informed choice. Here’s a breakdown of our pricing options: ## Techniques & Prices: - **1:1 Technique:** €89 - **2D–3D Volume Technique:** €98 - **4D–5D Volume Technique:** €139 ## Refills: - **1:1 Technique:** - €50 (up to 3 weeks) - €60 (up to 4 weeks) - €70 (up to 5 weeks) - **2D–3D Technique:** - €55 (up to 3 weeks) - €70 (up to 4 weeks) - €85 (up to 5 weeks) - **4D–5D Technique:** - €70 (up to 3 weeks) - €80 (up to 4 weeks) - €90 (up to 5 weeks) ## Lash Removal: - **Ha Beauty Lashes:** €14 - **Other Lashes:** €24 With these pricing options, you can find the perfect lash extension service that fits your style and budget. ================ File: _posts/hello-world.md ================ --- title: "Discover Lash Variations: Find Your Perfect Style" excerpt: "Explore lash variations such as Cat Eye Lashes, Classic Lashes, Hybrid Lashes.Find the style that enhances your natural beauty." coverImage: "/assets/blog/hello-world/cover.jpg" date: "2020-03-16T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/hello-world/cover.jpg" --- Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance your natural beauty effortlessly. In this article, we will explore various lash variations that you can choose from: ### Cat Eye Lashes This style elongates the outer corners of the eyes, giving a sultry look that enhances your natural features. ### Classic Lashes Perfect for a subtle enhancement, classic lashes involve applying one extension to each natural lash for a more natural appearance. ### Hybrid Lashes Combining both classic and volume techniques, hybrid lashes provide a balanced look that suits various eye shapes. ### Volume Lashes For those seeking a dramatic effect, volume lashes involve applying multiple lightweight extensions to each natural lash, resulting in a fuller look. ### Doll Eye Lashes This style creates a wide-eyed look, ideal for those wanting to achieve a youthful appearance. ### Staggered Lash Extensions Staggered lashes offer a unique and textured look, with varying lengths that add depth and dimension. ### Wispy Lashes These extensions create a soft, feathery look that adds a touch of romance to your eyes. ### Anime Lashes For a bold and playful style, anime lashes offer dramatic lengths and shapes that are perfect for making a statement. Each of these styles can enhance your natural beauty in different ways. Choose the one that resonates with your personal style and personality! ## Conclusion No matter which lash variation you choose, the right extensions can elevate your look and boost your confidence. Visit us at HA Beauty to explore these options further! ================ File: _posts/lash-extension.md ================ --- title: "The Transformative Power of Lash Extensions" excerpt: "Explore the transformative power of lash extensions and how they enhance natural beauty." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- Lash extensions have become a revolutionary beauty trend, offering women the opportunity to enhance their natural beauty effortlessly. Since their introduction, lash extensions have transformed the way women approach their beauty routines, providing a solution for those seeking longer, fuller lashes without the need for mascara. There are several types of lash extensions available, each designed to cater to different preferences and styles: 1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These involve applying a single extension to each natural lash, creating a natural and elegant look. 2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: This technique uses multiple lightweight extensions to create a fuller, more dramatic effect, perfect for those who desire a bolder look. 3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A combination of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look that suits various eye shapes and styles. At HA Beauty, we pride ourselves on our expertise in lash extensions. Our trained professionals ensure that each application is done with precision and care, allowing our clients to enjoy stunning, long-lasting results. We also provide essential aftercare tips to maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, ensuring that you can enjoy your beautiful lashes for weeks to come. Our mission is to empower women through beauty, helping them feel confident and radiant with every blink. ================ File: _posts/lashes.md ================ --- title: "The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions" excerpt: "Everything you need to know about lash extensions, trends, and professional insights." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2024-12-12T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- ## The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance the length and volume of natural lashes. This guide will provide you with everything you need to know about lash extensions, including the different types, application techniques, and aftercare tips. ### Types of Lash Extensions 1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These are individual lashes applied to each natural lash, providing a natural look. 2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller and more dramatic effect. 3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A mix of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look. ### Application Techniques The application of lash extensions should always be performed by a trained professional to ensure safety and optimal results. The process typically involves: - A consultation to determine the desired look. - Preparation of the natural lashes. - Application of the extensions using a specialized adhesive. ### Trends in Lash Extensions As the beauty industry evolves, so do the trends in lash extensions. Some current trends include: - **Colored Lash Extensions**: Adding a pop of color to your lashes for a fun and unique look. - **Lash Lifts**: A treatment that curls and lifts natural lashes without extensions, providing a more natural enhancement. ### Professional Insights To maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, proper aftercare is essential. Here are some tips: - Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours after application. - Use oil-free makeup removers. - Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks to keep your lashes looking their best. At HA Beauty Lashes, we are committed to providing our clients with the best lash extension services and education. Our goal is to help you achieve stunning, effortless beauty that lasts. ================ File: _posts/nails.md ================ --- title: "The Art of Nail Design" excerpt: "Discover the rich history and business origins of nail design." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- Nail design has a rich history that dates back thousands of years, with its origins rooted in ancient civilizations. The art of nail design has evolved significantly over the years, influenced by cultural trends, fashion, and technological advancements. In ancient Egypt, both men and women adorned their nails with henna, a practice that symbolized wealth and status. The use of nail polish can be traced back to the Ming Dynasty in China, where a mixture of beeswax, egg whites, and colored powders was used to create beautiful nail colors. As the centuries progressed, nail design became more sophisticated. The introduction of modern nail polish in the 20th century revolutionized the industry, allowing for a wider variety of colors and finishes. Today, nail design is not just a beauty trend but a form of self-expression, with techniques ranging from simple manicures to intricate nail art. At HA Beauty, we celebrate the art of nail design by offering a range of services that highlight the beauty and creativity of our clients. Our skilled technicians are trained in the latest techniques and trends, ensuring that every client leaves feeling beautiful and confident. ================ File: _posts/preview.md ================ --- title: "Lash Extensions 101: Everything You Need to Know Before Your First Appointment" excerpt: "Learn the essentials of lash extensions, from preparation tips to aftercare advice. In this article, we will explore various lash variations that you can choose from: ### Cat Eye Lashes This style elongates the outer corners of the eyes, giving a sultry look that enhances your natural features. ### Classic Lashes Perfect for a subtle enhancement, classic lashes involve applying one extension to each natural lash for a more natural appearance. ### Hybrid Lashes Combining both classic and volume techniques, hybrid lashes provide a balanced look that suits various eye shapes. ### Volume Lashes For those seeking a dramatic effect, volume lashes involve applying multiple lightweight extensions to each natural lash, resulting in a fuller look. ### Doll Eye Lashes This style creates a wide-eyed look, ideal for those wanting to achieve a youthful appearance. ### Staggered Lash Extensions Staggered lashes offer a unique and textured look, with varying lengths that add depth and dimension. ### Wispy Lashes These extensions create a soft, feathery look that adds a touch of romance to your eyes. ### Anime Lashes For a bold and playful style, anime lashes offer dramatic lengths and shapes that are perfect for making a statement. Each of these styles can enhance your natural beauty in different ways. Choose the one that resonates with your personal style and personality! ## Conclusion No matter which lash variation you choose, the right extensions can elevate your look and boost your confidence. Visit us at HA Beauty to explore these options further! ================ File: _posts/lash-extension.md ================ --- title: "The Transformative Power of Lash Extensions" excerpt: "Explore the transformative power of lash extensions and how they enhance natural beauty." coverImage: "/assets/LashExtensions.png" date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/LashExtensions.png" --- Lash extensions have become a revolutionary beauty trend, offering women the opportunity to enhance their natural beauty effortlessly. Since their introduction, lash extensions have transformed the way women approach their beauty routines, providing a solution for those seeking longer, fuller lashes without the need for mascara. There are several types of lash extensions available, each designed to cater to different preferences and styles: 1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These involve applying a single extension to each natural lash, creating a natural and elegant look. 2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: This technique uses multiple lightweight extensions to create a fuller, more dramatic effect, perfect for those who desire a bolder look. 3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A combination of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look that suits various eye shapes and styles. At HA Beauty, we pride ourselves on our expertise in lash extensions. Our trained professionals ensure that each application is done with precision and care, allowing our clients to enjoy stunning, long-lasting results. We also provide essential aftercare tips to maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, ensuring that you can enjoy your beautiful lashes for weeks to come. Our mission is to empower women through beauty, helping them feel confident and radiant with every blink. ================ File: _posts/lashes.md ================ --- title: "The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions" excerpt: "Everything you need to know about lash extensions, trends, and professional insights." coverImage: "/assets/ComprehensiveGuidetoLashBeauty.png" date: "2024-12-12T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/ComprehensiveGuidetoLashBeauty.png" --- ## The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance the length and volume of natural lashes. This guide will provide you with everything you need to know about lash extensions, including the different types, application techniques, and aftercare tips. ### Types of Lash Extensions 1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These are individual lashes applied to each natural lash, providing a natural look. 2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller and more dramatic effect. 3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A mix of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look. ### Application Techniques The application of lash extensions should always be performed by a trained professional to ensure safety and optimal results. The process typically involves: - A consultation to determine the desired look. - Preparation of the natural lashes. - Application of the extensions using a specialized adhesive. ### Trends in Lash Extensions As the beauty industry evolves, so do the trends in lash extensions. Some current trends include: - **Colored Lash Extensions**: Adding a pop of color to your lashes for a fun and unique look. - **Lash Lifts**: A treatment that curls and lifts natural lashes without extensions, providing a more natural enhancement. ### Professional Insights To maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, proper aftercare is essential. Here are some tips: - Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours after application. - Use oil-free makeup removers. - Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks to keep your lashes looking their best. At HA Beauty Lashes, we are committed to providing our clients with the best lash extension services and education. Our goal is to help you achieve stunning, effortless beauty that lasts. ================ File: _posts/nails.md ================ --- title: "The Art of Nail Design" excerpt: "Discover the rich history and business origins of nail design." coverImage: "/assets/ArtOfNailDesign.png" date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/ArtOfNailDesign.png" --- Nail design has a rich history that dates back thousands of years, with its origins rooted in ancient civilizations. The art of nail design has evolved significantly over the years, influenced by cultural trends, fashion, and technological advancements. In ancient Egypt, both men and women adorned their nails with henna, a practice that symbolized wealth and status. The use of nail polish can be traced back to the Ming Dynasty in China, where a mixture of beeswax, egg whites, and colored powders was used to create beautiful nail colors. As the centuries progressed, nail design became more sophisticated. The introduction of modern nail polish in the 20th century revolutionized the industry, allowing for a wider variety of colors and finishes. Today, nail design is not just a beauty trend but a form of self-expression, with techniques ranging from simple manicures to intricate nail art. At HA Beauty, we celebrate the art of nail design by offering a range of services that highlight the beauty and creativity of our clients. Our skilled technicians are trained in the latest techniques and trends, ensuring that every client leaves feeling beautiful and confident. ================ File: _posts/preview.md ================ --- title: "Lash Extensions 101: Everything You Need to Know Before Your First Appointment" excerpt: "Learn the essentials of lash extensions, from preparation tips to aftercare advice. Refill and removal services also available." coverImage: "/assets/blog/dynamic-routing/cover.jpg" date: "2020-03-16T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/dynamic-routing/cover.jpg" --- Understanding the pricing of lash extensions is essential for making an informed choice. Here’s a breakdown of our pricing options: ## Techniques & Prices: - **1:1 Technique:** €89 - **2D–3D Volume Technique:** €98 - **4D–5D Volume Technique:** €139 ## Refills: - **1:1 Technique:** - €50 (up to 3 weeks) - €60 (up to 4 weeks) - €70 (up to 5 weeks) - **2D–3D Technique:** - €55 (up to 3 weeks) - €70 (up to 4 weeks) - €85 (up to 5 weeks) - **4D–5D Technique:** - €70 (up to 3 weeks) - €80 (up to 4 weeks) - €90 (up to 5 weeks) ## Lash Removal: - **Ha Beauty Lashes:** €14 - **Other Lashes:** €24 With these pricing options, you can find the perfect lash extension service that fits your style and budget. ================ File: _posts/hello-world.md ================ --- title: "Discover Lash Variations: Find Your Perfect Style" excerpt: "Explore lash variations such as Cat Eye Lashes, Classic Lashes, Hybrid Lashes.Find the style that enhances your natural beauty." coverImage: "/assets/blog/hello-world/cover.jpg" date: "2020-03-16T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/hello-world/cover.jpg" --- Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance your natural beauty effortlessly. In this article, we will explore various lash variations that you can choose from: ### Cat Eye Lashes This style elongates the outer corners of the eyes, giving a sultry look that enhances your natural features. ### Classic Lashes Perfect for a subtle enhancement, classic lashes involve applying one extension to each natural lash for a more natural appearance. ### Hybrid Lashes Combining both classic and volume techniques, hybrid lashes provide a balanced look that suits various eye shapes. ### Volume Lashes For those seeking a dramatic effect, volume lashes involve applying multiple lightweight extensions to each natural lash, resulting in a fuller look. ### Doll Eye Lashes This style creates a wide-eyed look, ideal for those wanting to achieve a youthful appearance. ### Staggered Lash Extensions Staggered lashes offer a unique and textured look, with varying lengths that add depth and dimension. ### Wispy Lashes These extensions create a soft, feathery look that adds a touch of romance to your eyes. ### Anime Lashes For a bold and playful style, anime lashes offer dramatic lengths and shapes that are perfect for making a statement. Each of these styles can enhance your natural beauty in different ways. Choose the one that resonates with your personal style and personality! ## Conclusion No matter which lash variation you choose, the right extensions can elevate your look and boost your confidence. Visit us at HA Beauty to explore these options further! ================ File: _posts/lash-extension.md ================ --- title: "The Transformative Power of Lash Extensions" excerpt: "Explore the transformative power of lash extensions and how they enhance natural beauty." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- Lash extensions have become a revolutionary beauty trend, offering women the opportunity to enhance their natural beauty effortlessly. Since their introduction, lash extensions have transformed the way women approach their beauty routines, providing a solution for those seeking longer, fuller lashes without the need for mascara. There are several types of lash extensions available, each designed to cater to different preferences and styles: 1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These involve applying a single extension to each natural lash, creating a natural and elegant look. 2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: This technique uses multiple lightweight extensions to create a fuller, more dramatic effect, perfect for those who desire a bolder look. 3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A combination of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look that suits various eye shapes and styles. At HA Beauty, we pride ourselves on our expertise in lash extensions. Our trained professionals ensure that each application is done with precision and care, allowing our clients to enjoy stunning, long-lasting results. We also provide essential aftercare tips to maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, ensuring that you can enjoy your beautiful lashes for weeks to come. Our mission is to empower women through beauty, helping them feel confident and radiant with every blink. ================ File: _posts/lashes.md ================ --- title: "The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions" excerpt: "Everything you need to know about lash extensions, trends, and professional insights." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2024-12-12T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- ## The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance the length and volume of natural lashes. This guide will provide you with everything you need to know about lash extensions, including the different types, application techniques, and aftercare tips. ### Types of Lash Extensions 1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These are individual lashes applied to each natural lash, providing a natural look. 2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller and more dramatic effect. 3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A mix of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look. ### Application Techniques The application of lash extensions should always be performed by a trained professional to ensure safety and optimal results. The process typically involves: - A consultation to determine the desired look. - Preparation of the natural lashes. - Application of the extensions using a specialized adhesive. ### Trends in Lash Extensions As the beauty industry evolves, so do the trends in lash extensions. Some current trends include: - **Colored Lash Extensions**: Adding a pop of color to your lashes for a fun and unique look. - **Lash Lifts**: A treatment that curls and lifts natural lashes without extensions, providing a more natural enhancement. ### Professional Insights To maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, proper aftercare is essential. Here are some tips: - Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours after application. - Use oil-free makeup removers. - Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks to keep your lashes looking their best. At HA Beauty Lashes, we are committed to providing our clients with the best lash extension services and education. Our goal is to help you achieve stunning, effortless beauty that lasts. ================ File: _posts/nails.md ================ --- title: "The Art of Nail Design" excerpt: "Discover the rich history and business origins of nail design." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- Nail design has a rich history that dates back thousands of years, with its origins rooted in ancient civilizations. The art of nail design has evolved significantly over the years, influenced by cultural trends, fashion, and technological advancements. In ancient Egypt, both men and women adorned their nails with henna, a practice that symbolized wealth and status. The use of nail polish can be traced back to the Ming Dynasty in China, where a mixture of beeswax, egg whites, and colored powders was used to create beautiful nail colors. As the centuries progressed, nail design became more sophisticated. The introduction of modern nail polish in the 20th century revolutionized the industry, allowing for a wider variety of colors and finishes. Today, nail design is not just a beauty trend but a form of self-expression, with techniques ranging from simple manicures to intricate nail art. At HA Beauty, we celebrate the art of nail design by offering a range of services that highlight the beauty and creativity of our clients. Our skilled technicians are trained in the latest techniques and trends, ensuring that every client leaves feeling beautiful and confident. ================ File: _posts/preview.md ================ --- title: "Lash Extensions 101: Everything You Need to Know Before Your First Appointment" excerpt: "Learn the essentials of lash extensions, from preparation tips to aftercare advice. Discover the benefits, types, and how to ensure your first appointment is seamless." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2020-03-16T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- Getting lash extensions is an exciting experience, but it's essential to be well-prepared. Here’s everything you need to know: ## What are Lash Extensions? Lash extensions are semi-permanent fibers applied to your natural lashes to enhance their length, thickness, and fullness. ## Types of Lash Extensions There are various types of lash extensions, including classic, volume, hybrid, and more, each offering different looks and effects. ## Preparation Tips for Your First Appointment - Arrive with clean, makeup-free eyes. - Avoid caffeine before your appointment to reduce jitters. - Discuss your desired look with your technician. ## Aftercare Essentials To maintain your lash extensions: - Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours. - Use oil-free makeup removers. - Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks. By following these tips, you can ensure a seamless experience and enjoy your beautiful lashes for weeks to come! ================ File: src/app/_components/alert.tsx ================ const Alert = () => { return

", "role": "system"}, {"content": " You are tasked with resolving an issue and modifying a file. ### Issue Details: Content of 'issue-description.txt': # Issue Title: Update Blog Post Images and Header for Enhanced Branding and Engagement # Benefit Hypothesis - **Enhance User Experience:** Replacing the irrelevant cover images with more appropriate ones will provide better visual context. - **Improve Engagement:** More relevant images will lead to increased engagement and social media sharing due to better OG images. --- # Objective - **Update Markdown Files:** Update the markdown files in the `_posts` folder to assign new, relevant cover and OG images that align with the content, title, or excerpt of each blog post. - **Unique Image Assignment:** Ensure that each image is used only once across the posts. - **Header Update:** Replace the header "Blog" with the Ha Beauty logo. --- # Story Context - **Current Issue:** The cover images and OG images for several blog posts do not reflect the subject matter. This reduces the effectiveness of the posts in both user experience and social media sharing. - **Improvement Goal:** By replacing these images with more relevant ones, we aim to improve visitor / user interaction with the blog and increase visibility on social platforms. - **Header Enhancement:** Currently, the header only states "Blog". It should be updated to display the Ha Beauty logo. --- # Technical Requirements - **Image Resources:** The following images from the `/assets/` folder will be used to update the cover and OG images: - `AboutHaBeauty.png` - `ArtOfNailDesign.png` - `ComprehensiveGuidetoLashBeauty.png` - `LashExtensions.png` - `LashVariations.png` - `LashExtension101.png` - `Pricing.png` - **Markdown File Updates:** - Ensure that each markdown file in the `_posts` folder has the correct `coverImage` and `ogImage` values assigned. - No image should be used for more than one post. - Each image should be relevant to the content, title, or excerpt of the blog post. --- # Implementation Steps ## 1. Updating Posts in `/_posts/` - **Review Posts:** Review all existing markdown files in the `_posts` folder. - **Identify Irrelevant Images:** Identify all posts with irrelevant cover images and OG images based on the content, title, or excerpt. - **Assign Appropriate Images:** For each post in the `_posts` folder, locate the appropriate image from the `/assets/` folder to assign to the `coverImage` and `ogImage` fields. **Available images:** - `AboutHaBeauty.png` - `ArtOfNailDesign.png` - `ComprehensiveGuidetoLashBeauty.png` - `LashExtensions.png` - `LashVariations.png` - `LashExtension101.png` - `Pricing.png` **Note:** No image should be used for more than one post. For example, the appropriate picture for `aboutus.md` would be `AboutHaBeauty.png`. - **Update Image Values:** Update the `coverImage` and `ogImage` values with the corresponding new images and image URLs. ## 2. Updating `header.tsx` - **Import `next/image`:** At the top of your Header component file, import the Next.js Image component. - **Replace "Blog" with Logo:** - Remove the current text ("Blog") inside the `Link` component. - Add the Image component inside the `Link` with the source pointing to the logo path (`/assets/blog/authors/hang.png`). - **Make the Image Responsive:** - Set the `layout="intrinsic"` property. - Define default `width` and `height`. - Apply Tailwind CSS classes for responsive sizing. - **Maintain Existing Styling:** Ensure that the flex layout and other styles (such as text size and margins) from the original header component remain intact. --- # Acceptance Criteria - **Post Updates:** - All posts in the `_posts` folder have updated `coverImage` and `ogImage` values that are relevant to their content. - Each image from the `/assets/` folder is assigned to exactly one post. - No image is duplicated across posts. - **Functionality:** The updates are made without breaking any existing functionality of the blog, and all markdown files are correctly formatted. - **Header Update:** The logo is imported correctly into the header component and is responsive on different screen sizes. ### File to Modify: Content of 'repomix-output.txt': This file is a merged representation of the entire codebase, combining all repository files into a single document. Refill and removal services also available." coverImage: "/assets/blog/dynamic-routing/cover.jpg" date: "2020-03-16T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/dynamic-routing/cover.jpg" --- Understanding the pricing of lash extensions is essential for making an informed choice. Here’s a breakdown of our pricing options: ## Techniques & Prices: - **1:1 Technique:** €89 - **2D–3D Volume Technique:** €98 - **4D–5D Volume Technique:** €139 ## Refills: - **1:1 Technique:** - €50 (up to 3 weeks) - €60 (up to 4 weeks) - €70 (up to 5 weeks) - **2D–3D Technique:** - €55 (up to 3 weeks) - €70 (up to 4 weeks) - €85 (up to 5 weeks) - **4D–5D Technique:** - €70 (up to 3 weeks) - €80 (up to 4 weeks) - €90 (up to 5 weeks) ## Lash Removal: - **Ha Beauty Lashes:** €14 - **Other Lashes:** €24 With these pricing options, you can find the perfect lash extension service that fits your style and budget. ================ File: _posts/hello-world.md ================ --- title: "Discover Lash Variations: Find Your Perfect Style" excerpt: "Explore lash variations such as Cat Eye Lashes, Classic Lashes, Hybrid Lashes.Find the style that enhances your natural beauty." coverImage: "/assets/blog/hello-world/cover.jpg" date: "2020-03-16T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/hello-world/cover.jpg" --- Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance your natural beauty effortlessly. In this article, we will explore various lash variations that you can choose from: ### Cat Eye Lashes This style elongates the outer corners of the eyes, giving a sultry look that enhances your natural features. ### Classic Lashes Perfect for a subtle enhancement, classic lashes involve applying one extension to each natural lash for a more natural appearance. ### Hybrid Lashes Combining both classic and volume techniques, hybrid lashes provide a balanced look that suits various eye shapes. ### Volume Lashes For those seeking a dramatic effect, volume lashes involve applying multiple lightweight extensions to each natural lash, resulting in a fuller look. ### Doll Eye Lashes This style creates a wide-eyed look, ideal for those wanting to achieve a youthful appearance. ### Staggered Lash Extensions Staggered lashes offer a unique and textured look, with varying lengths that add depth and dimension. ### Wispy Lashes These extensions create a soft, feathery look that adds a touch of romance to your eyes. ### Anime Lashes For a bold and playful style, anime lashes offer dramatic lengths and shapes that are perfect for making a statement. Each of these styles can enhance your natural beauty in different ways. Choose the one that resonates with your personal style and personality! ## Conclusion No matter which lash variation you choose, the right extensions can elevate your look and boost your confidence. Visit us at HA Beauty to explore these options further! ================ File: _posts/lash-extension.md ================ --- title: "The Transformative Power of Lash Extensions" excerpt: "Explore the transformative power of lash extensions and how they enhance natural beauty." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- Lash extensions have become a revolutionary beauty trend, offering women the opportunity to enhance their natural beauty effortlessly. Since their introduction, lash extensions have transformed the way women approach their beauty routines, providing a solution for those seeking longer, fuller lashes without the need for mascara. There are several types of lash extensions available, each designed to cater to different preferences and styles: 1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These involve applying a single extension to each natural lash, creating a natural and elegant look. 2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: This technique uses multiple lightweight extensions to create a fuller, more dramatic effect, perfect for those who desire a bolder look. 3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A combination of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look that suits various eye shapes and styles. At HA Beauty, we pride ourselves on our expertise in lash extensions. Our trained professionals ensure that each application is done with precision and care, allowing our clients to enjoy stunning, long-lasting results. We also provide essential aftercare tips to maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, ensuring that you can enjoy your beautiful lashes for weeks to come. Our mission is to empower women through beauty, helping them feel confident and radiant with every blink. ================ File: _posts/lashes.md ================ --- title: "The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions" excerpt: "Everything you need to know about lash extensions, trends, and professional insights." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2024-12-12T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- ## The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance the length and volume of natural lashes. This guide will provide you with everything you need to know about lash extensions, including the different types, application techniques, and aftercare tips. ### Types of Lash Extensions 1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These are individual lashes applied to each natural lash, providing a natural look. 2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller and more dramatic effect. 3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A mix of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look. ### Application Techniques The application of lash extensions should always be performed by a trained professional to ensure safety and optimal results. The process typically involves: - A consultation to determine the desired look. - Preparation of the natural lashes. - Application of the extensions using a specialized adhesive. ### Trends in Lash Extensions As the beauty industry evolves, so do the trends in lash extensions. Some current trends include: - **Colored Lash Extensions**: Adding a pop of color to your lashes for a fun and unique look. - **Lash Lifts**: A treatment that curls and lifts natural lashes without extensions, providing a more natural enhancement. ### Professional Insights To maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, proper aftercare is essential. Here are some tips: - Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours after application. - Use oil-free makeup removers. - Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks to keep your lashes looking their best. At HA Beauty Lashes, we are committed to providing our clients with the best lash extension services and education. Our goal is to help you achieve stunning, effortless beauty that lasts. ================ File: _posts/nails.md ================ --- title: "The Art of Nail Design" excerpt: "Discover the rich history and business origins of nail design." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- Nail design has a rich history that dates back thousands of years, with its origins rooted in ancient civilizations. The art of nail design has evolved significantly over the years, influenced by cultural trends, fashion, and technological advancements. In ancient Egypt, both men and women adorned their nails with henna, a practice that symbolized wealth and status. The use of nail polish can be traced back to the Ming Dynasty in China, where a mixture of beeswax, egg whites, and colored powders was used to create beautiful nail colors. As the centuries progressed, nail design became more sophisticated. The introduction of modern nail polish in the 20th century revolutionized the industry, allowing for a wider variety of colors and finishes. Today, nail design is not just a beauty trend but a form of self-expression, with techniques ranging from simple manicures to intricate nail art. At HA Beauty, we celebrate the art of nail design by offering a range of services that highlight the beauty and creativity of our clients. Our skilled technicians are trained in the latest techniques and trends, ensuring that every client leaves feeling beautiful and confident. ================ File: _posts/preview.md ================ --- title: "Lash Extensions 101: Everything You Need to Know Before Your First Appointment" excerpt: "Learn the essentials of lash extensions, from preparation tips to aftercare advice. Discover the benefits, types, and how to ensure your first appointment is seamless." coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" date: "2020-03-16T05:35:07.322Z" author: name: Hang picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png" ogImage: url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg" --- Getting lash extensions is an exciting experience, but it's essential to be well-prepared. Here’s everything you need to know: ## What are Lash Extensions? Lash extensions are semi-permanent fibers applied to your natural lashes to enhance their length, thickness, and fullness. ## Types of Lash Extensions There are various types of lash extensions, including classic, volume, hybrid, and more, each offering different looks and effects. ## Preparation Tips for Your First Appointment - Arrive with clean, makeup-free eyes. - Avoid caffeine before your appointment to reduce jitters. - Discuss your desired look with your technician. ## Aftercare Essentials To maintain your lash extensions: - Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours. - Use oil-free makeup removers. - Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks. By following these tips, you can ensure a seamless experience and enjoy your beautiful lashes for weeks to come! ================ File: src/app/_components/alert.tsx ================ const Alert = () => { return

## About HA Beauty Lashes

HA Beauty Lashes was established in 2020 in Glienicke Nordbahn, as an extension of the renowned Ha Beauty brand. Our journey began with a passion for enhancing natural beauty through expertly crafted lash extensions. Since our inception, we have dedicated ourselves to providing high-quality lash services that not only beautify but also empower our clients.

Our team of skilled professionals is trained in the latest techniques and trends in lash extensions, ensuring that every client receives personalized care and attention. We believe that every woman deserves to feel beautiful and confident, and our mission is to help them achieve that effortlessly.

At HA Beauty Lashes, we pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. We continuously strive to innovate and improve our services, making us the go-to destination for lash extensions in Glienicke and beyond.

---
title: "Discover Lash Variations: Find Your Perfect Style"
excerpt: "Explore lash variations such as Cat Eye Lashes, Classic Lashes, Hybrid Lashes.Find the style that enhances your natural beauty."
coverImage: "/assets/LashVariations.png"
date: "2020-03-16T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/LashVariations.png"
---

Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance your natural beauty effortlessly. In this article, we will explore various lash variations that you can choose from:

### Cat Eye Lashes
This style elongates the outer corners of the eyes, giving a sultry look that enhances your natural features.

### Classic Lashes
Perfect for a subtle enhancement, classic lashes involve applying one extension to each natural lash for a more natural appearance.

### Hybrid Lashes
Combining both classic and volume techniques, hybrid lashes provide a balanced look that suits various eye shapes.

### Volume Lashes
For those seeking a dramatic effect, volume lashes involve applying multiple lightweight extensions to each natural lash, resulting in a fuller look.

### Doll Eye Lashes
This style creates a wide-eyed look, ideal for those wanting to achieve a youthful appearance.

### Staggered Lash Extensions
Staggered lashes offer a unique and textured look, with varying lengths that add depth and dimension.

### Wispy Lashes
These extensions create a soft, feathery look that adds a touch of romance to your eyes.

### Anime Lashes
For a bold and playful style, anime lashes offer dramatic lengths and shapes that are perfect for making a statement.

Each of these styles can enhance your natural beauty in different ways. Choose the one that resonates with your personal style and personality!

## Conclusion
No matter which lash variation you choose, the right extensions can elevate your look and boost your confidence. Visit us at HA Beauty to explore these options further!

---
title: "The Transformative Power of Lash Extensions"
excerpt: "Explore the transformative power of lash extensions and how they enhance natural beauty."
coverImage: "/assets/LashExtensions.png"
date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/LashExtensions.png"
---

Lash extensions have become a revolutionary beauty trend, offering women the opportunity to enhance their natural beauty effortlessly. Since their introduction, lash extensions have transformed the way women approach their beauty routines, providing a solution for those seeking longer, fuller lashes without the need for mascara.

There are several types of lash extensions available, each designed to cater to different preferences and styles:

1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These involve applying a single extension to each natural lash, creating a natural and elegant look.
2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: This technique uses multiple lightweight extensions to create a fuller, more dramatic effect, perfect for those who desire a bolder look.
3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A combination of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look that suits various eye shapes and styles.

At HA Beauty, we pride ourselves on our expertise in lash extensions. Our trained professionals ensure that each application is done with precision and care, allowing our clients to enjoy stunning, long-lasting results. We also provide essential aftercare tips to maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, ensuring that you can enjoy your beautiful lashes for weeks to come.

Our mission is to empower women through beauty, helping them feel confident and radiant with every blink.

## The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions

Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance the length and volume of natural lashes. This guide will provide you with everything you need to know about lash extensions, including the different types, application techniques, and aftercare tips.

### Types of Lash Extensions

1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These are individual lashes applied to each natural lash, providing a natural look.
2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller and more dramatic effect.
3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A mix of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look.

### Application Techniques

The application of lash extensions should always be performed by a trained professional to ensure safety and optimal results. The process typically involves:

- A consultation to determine the desired look.
- Preparation of the natural lashes.
- Application of the extensions using a specialized adhesive.

### Trends in Lash Extensions

As the beauty industry evolves, so do the trends in lash extensions. Some current trends include:

- **Colored Lash Extensions**: Adding a pop of color to your lashes for a fun and unique look.
- **Lash Lifts**: A treatment that curls and lifts natural lashes without extensions, providing a more natural enhancement.

### Professional Insights

To maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, proper aftercare is essential. Here are some tips:

- Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours after application.
- Use oil-free makeup removers.
- Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks to keep your lashes looking their best.

At HA Beauty Lashes, we are committed to providing our clients with the best lash extension services and education. Our goal is to help you achieve stunning, effortless beauty that lasts.

---
title: "Discover Lash Variations: Find Your Perfect Style"
excerpt: "Explore lash variations such as Cat Eye Lashes, Classic Lashes, Hybrid Lashes.Find the style that enhances your natural beauty."
coverImage: "/assets/LashVariations.png"
date: "2020-03-16T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/LashVariations.png"
---

Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance your natural beauty effortlessly. In this article, we will explore various lash variations that you can choose from:

### Cat Eye Lashes
This style elongates the outer corners of the eyes, giving a sultry look that enhances your natural features.

### Classic Lashes
Perfect for a subtle enhancement, classic lashes involve applying one extension to each natural lash for a more natural appearance.

### Hybrid Lashes
Combining both classic and volume techniques, hybrid lashes provide a balanced look that suits various eye shapes.

### Volume Lashes
For those seeking a dramatic effect, volume lashes involve applying multiple lightweight extensions to each natural lash, resulting in a fuller look.

### Doll Eye Lashes
This style creates a wide-eyed look, ideal for those wanting to achieve a youthful appearance.

### Staggered Lash Extensions
Staggered lashes offer a unique and textured look, with varying lengths that add depth and dimension.

### Wispy Lashes
These extensions create a soft, feathery look that adds a touch of romance to your eyes.

### Anime Lashes
For a bold and playful style, anime lashes offer dramatic lengths and shapes that are perfect for making a statement.

Each of these styles can enhance your natural beauty in different ways. Choose the one that resonates with your personal style and personality!

## Conclusion
No matter which lash variation you choose, the right extensions can elevate your look and boost your confidence. Visit us at HA Beauty to explore these options further!

excerpt: "Everything you need to know about lash extensions, trends, and professional insights."

## The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions

Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance the length and volume of natural lashes. This guide will provide you with everything you need to know about lash extensions, including the different types, application techniques, and aftercare tips.

### Types of Lash Extensions

1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These are individual lashes applied to each natural lash, providing a natural look.
2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller and more dramatic effect.
3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A mix of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look.

### Application Techniques

The application of lash extensions should always be performed by a trained professional to ensure safety and optimal results. The process typically involves:

- A consultation to determine the desired look.
- Preparation of the natural lashes.
- Application of the extensions using a specialized adhesive.

### Trends in Lash Extensions

As the beauty industry evolves, so do the trends in lash extensions. Some current trends include:

- **Colored Lash Extensions**: Adding a pop of color to your lashes for a fun and unique look.
- **Lash Lifts**: A treatment that curls and lifts natural lashes without extensions, providing a more natural enhancement.

### Professional Insights

To maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, proper aftercare is essential. Here are some tips:

- Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours after application.
- Use oil-free makeup removers.
- Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks to keep your lashes looking their best.

At HA Beauty Lashes, we are committed to providing our clients with the best lash extension services and education. Our goal is to help you achieve stunning, effortless beauty that lasts.

import cn from "classnames";
import Link from "next/link";
import Image from "next/image";

type Props = {
  title: string;
  src: string;
  slug?: string;
};

const CoverImage = ({ title, src, slug }: Props) => {
  const image = (
    <Image
      src={src}
      alt={`Cover Image for ${title}`}
      className={cn("shadow-sm w-full rounded-lg", { // Added rounded-lg for rounded corners
        "hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow duration-200": slug,
      })}
      width={1300}
      height={630}
    />
  );
  return (
    <div className="sm:mx-0">
      {slug ? (
        <Link href={`/posts/${slug}`} aria-label={title}>
          {image}
        </Link>
      ) : (
        image
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default CoverImage;

type Props = {

  title,
  coverImage,
  date,
  excerpt,
  author,

    <div>

      <Avatar name={author.name} picture={author.picture} />
    </div>
  );
}

'use client';

import React, { useState } from 'react';
import questions from '../questions.json';

type OptionKeys = 'A' | 'B' | 'C';

interface Question {
  question: string;
  options: Record<OptionKeys, string>;
}

interface RefillOptions {
  up_to_3_weeks: string;
  up_to_4_weeks: string;
  up_to_5_weeks: string;
}

interface RemovalOptions {
  option_1: string;
  option_2: string;
}

interface Result {
  recommendation: string;
  refill_options: RefillOptions;
  removal_options?: RemovalOptions;
}

interface Results {
  mostly_A: Result;
  mostly_B: Result;
  mostly_C: Result;
}

interface QuestionsData {
  title: string;
  questions: Question[];
  results: Results;
}

const Quiz: React.FC = () => {
  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);
  const [answers, setAnswers] = useState<Record<number, OptionKeys | null>>({});
  const [result, setResult] = useState<Result | null>(null);

  const handleChange = (questionIndex: number, option: OptionKeys) => {
    setAnswers((prev) => ({ ...prev, [questionIndex]: option }));
    setResult(null); // Reset result when answers change
  };

  const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    const count: Record<OptionKeys, number> = { A: 0, B: 0, C: 0 };

    Object.values(answers).forEach((answer) => {
      if (answer) {
        count[answer]++;
      }
    });

    const maxAnswer = Object.keys(count).reduce((a, b) => (count[a as OptionKeys] > count[b as OptionKeys] ? a : b)) as OptionKeys;
    const results = (questions as QuestionsData).results;
    setResult(results[`mostly_${maxAnswer}`]);
  };

  return (
    <div className="w-full max-w-2xl mx-auto my-8">
      <button
        onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
        className="w-full bg-pink-500 hover:bg-pink-600 text-white font-bold py-4 px-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 flex justify-between items-center"
      >
        <span>Find Your Perfect Lash Treatment!</span>
        <span className="transform transition-transform duration-300" style={{ transform: isOpen ? 'rotate(180deg)' : 'none' }}>
          ▼
        </span>
      </button>
      
      {isOpen && (
        <div className="mt-4 p-6 bg-white dark:bg-rose-800 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
          <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-6 text-center">{(questions as QuestionsData).title}</h2>
          <form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
            {(questions as QuestionsData).questions.map((question: Question, index: number) => (
              <div key={index} className="mb-6">
                <p className="font-semibold mb-3">{question.question}</p>
                <div className="space-y-2">
                  {Object.entries(question.options).map(([key, value]) => (
                    <label key={key} className="flex items-center space-x-3 p-3 hover:bg-pink-50 dark:hover:bg-rose-700 rounded-lg cursor-pointer transition-colors duration-200">
                      <input
                        type="radio"
                        name={`question-${index}`}
                        value={key}
                        onChange={() => handleChange(index, key as OptionKeys)}
                        checked={answers[index] === key}
                        className="form-radio text-pink-500"
                      />
                      <span>{value}</span>
                    </label>
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
            <button 
              type="submit" 
              className="w-full bg-pink-500 hover:bg-pink-600 text-white font-bold py-3 px-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg transition-all duration-300"
            >
              Get Your Recommendation
            </button>
          </form>
          
          {result && (
            <div className="mt-8 p-6 bg-pink-50 dark:bg-rose-700 rounded-lg">
              <h3 className="text-xl font-bold mb-4">Your Recommendation</h3>
              <p className="mb-4">{result.recommendation}</p>
              
              <h4 className="font-semibold mb-2">Refill Options:</h4>
              <ul className="list-disc pl-5 mb-4">
                <li>Up to 3 weeks: {result.refill_options.up_to_3_weeks}</li>
                <li>Up to 4 weeks: {result.refill_options.up_to_4_weeks}</li>
                <li>Up to 5 weeks: {result.refill_options.up_to_5_weeks}</li>
              </ul>

              {result.removal_options && (
                <>
                  <h4 className="font-semibold mb-2">Removal Options:</h4>
                  <ul className="list-disc pl-5">
                    <li>{result.removal_options.option_1}</li>
                    <li>{result.removal_options.option_2}</li>
                  </ul>
                </>
              )}
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default Quiz;
